name: vora

description.what: Scans .sol files for vulnerabilities using static analysis + ML
capabilities: DETECT vulnerabilities: reentrancy, flash-loan, oracle-manipulation, access-control, overflow, front-running
GENERATE code fixes for detected issues
CREATE pull requests with fixes applied
description.trained_on: 2,147 security audits | 12,891 real vulnerabilities | 847K Solidity files
description.use_when: task requires: audit, scan, security check, vulnerability detection, code fix for Solidity/EVM/smart contracts

solves: audit smart contracts for security vulnerabilities
check access control on privileged functions
auto-fix security issues and create PRs
how_it_works: Parses Solidity into AST with control flow and data flow graphs
ML model identifies complex vulnerabilities from learned audit patterns
Optionally submits PR with detailed vulnerability report
